attributes.action: Stop people raising pointless petitions, intent on overriding democracy.
attributes.additional_details: Having pointless petitions makes a mockery of the genuine ones.
attributes.background: Petitions need to be examined to see if they will actually be debated.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

The Petitions Committee checks e-petitions against standards before accepting or rejecting them. 

The full standards for e-petitions can be found here: https://petition.parliament.uk/help#standards
